title.zh: 南昌：江西省医学会检验学分会学术会议
title.en: Nanchang: Jiangxi Medical Association Laboratory Medicine Branch Academic Conference

subtitle.zh: 第二十二次医学检验学分会学术会议

description.zh: 左钰洁、古艳、周莉、龙品品等的论文《中国中部地区女性血友病携带者及女性血友病患者低成本临床预测模型》在「江西省医学会第二十二次医学检验学分会学术会议」优秀论文评选活动中荣获优胜奖。这一成果体现了血友姐妹会在学术研究方面的重要进展，为血友病女性的临床诊断提供了有价值的预测工具。
description.en: The paper 'Low-cost Clinical Prediction Model for Female Hemophilia Carriers and Women with Hemophilia in Central China' by Yujie (Ruby) Zuo, Gu Yan, Zhou Li, Long Pinpin and others won the Excellence Award in the outstanding paper selection activity of the '22nd Academic Conference of Jiangxi Medical Association Laboratory Medicine Branch'. This achievement reflects the important progress of the Hemophilia Sisters team in academic research, providing valuable predictive tools for clinical diagnosis of women with hemophilia.

description.zh: 江西省医学会第二十二次医学检验学分会学术会议优秀论文优胜奖证书
description.en: Excellence Award certificate for outstanding paper at the 22nd Academic Conference of Jiangxi Medical Association Laboratory Medicine Branch
